intent_atoms.description: As an analyst, I want to select validation presets from a SwiftUI settings pane so that I can quickly apply a set of rule configurations.
As an analyst, I want to toggle individual validation rules in the settings UI so that I can override preset defaults for specific rules.

As an analyst, I want changes to be persisted to Application Support global defaults and optional workspace-specific overrides so that my configuration survives app restarts and is consistent across workspaces.
The settings pane lists all bundled presets with descriptions and updates the active configuration immediately after selection.
Per‑rule toggles reflect the current preset, allow overrides, and show when the user diverges from preset defaults (e.g., "Custom" state).
Choices persist to Application Support global defaults and optional workspace‑specific overrides, including a "Reset to Global” affor­dance that clears local customizations.
Validation badges, lists and downstream exports reflect the active preset metadata – … .
The UI must observe and re‑apply the current ..???

functional_units.name: Preset Selection Pane
functional_units.description: Displays all bundled validation presets with descriptions and allows the user to select one, immediately updating the active configuration.

functional_units.name: Per-Rule Toggle Controls
functional_units.description: Shows individual rule toggles reflecting the current preset, permits overrides, and indicates custom states when diverging from preset defaults.

functional_units.name: Reset to Global Button
functional_units.description: Provides an affordance to clear local workspace overrides and revert to global default settings.

functional_units.name: Persistence Layer Integration
functional_units.description: Saves user selections and overrides to Application Support global defaults and optional workspace-specific files, ensuring persistence across upgrades.

functional_units.name: Configuration Observer
functional_units.description: Observes changes in ValidationConfiguration/ValidationPreset APIs to provide live UI feedback when configuration updates occur.

functional_units.name: Badge & Export Sync
functional_units.description: Updates validation badges, lists, and downstream exports to reflect the active preset metadata so CLI/JSON outputs remain aligned.
